oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of dual reciprocity boundary elements for simulation of groundwater flow and pollutant transport
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ELDHO, TI
YOUNG, DL
RAO, BV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: groundwater flow
pollution dispersion
dual reciprocity boundary elements
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The dual reciprocity boundary element method (DRBEM) has been established as an effective numerical tool in the modeling of various engineering problems. Here the application of the DRBEM in groundwater flow and pollutant transport is described. Several cases analyzed prove that DRBEM is an effective numerical tool in simulating these problems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHINESE INSTITUTE OF ENGINEERS, 22(6), 795-803
